affixes.name: Chance for projectiles to cast twice
Chance to Cast an additional Elemental Skill
Chance to cast an additional Elemental Skill

suffixes.name: Alacrity
suffixes.description: Your Skills Cooldown [VALUE]% faster while moving.

suffixes.name: Anemia
suffixes.description: Damaging Bleeding or Vulnerable enemies has a [VALUE]% chance to Stun them for 2 seconds.

suffixes.name: Avoidance
suffixes.description: Whenever an enemy hits you, your Dodge Chance against that enemy increases by [VALUE]. Successfully Dodging resets this bonus.

suffixes.name: Berserk Ripping
suffixes.description: Whenever you deal direct damage while Berserking, inflict [VALUE]% of the base damage dealt as additional Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.

suffixes.name: Poisonous Clouds
suffixes.description: When entering Stealth, create a cloud that deals [VALUE]% Poison damage over 6 seconds.

suffixes.name: Biting Cold
suffixes.description: When you Freeze an enemy there is a [VALUE]% chance they become Vulnerable for 3 seconds.

suffixes.name: Binding Morass
suffixes.description: Dealing indirect damage to an enemy progressively Slows them by [VALUE]% for 3 seconds. You deal 20% increased damage to Slowed Enemies.

suffixes.name: Charged Flash
suffixes.description: After Charged Bolts hits enemies 50 times, your next 3 casts of Charged Bolts become waves that pierce and deal [VALUE]% Critical Shock Damage.

suffixes.name: Conflagration
suffixes.description: While channeling Incinerate, your Burning damage is increased by [VALUE]%. Enemies hit by Incinerate explode.

suffixes.name: Control
suffixes.description: You deal [VALUE]% more damage to Immobilized, Stunned, or Frozen enemies.

uniqueSuffixes.name: Cleaver
uniqueSuffixes.description: Critically Striking an enemy has up to a 100% chance to Fear and Slow them by [VALUE]% for 4 seconds.

uniqueSuffixes.name: Shred
uniqueSuffixes.description: Killing an enemy grants Stealth for 2 seconds. Breaking Stealth with an attack grants guaranteed [VALUE]% Critical Strikes chance

uniqueSuffixes.name: Skyhunter
uniqueSuffixes.description: The first direct damage you deal to an enemy is a guaranteed Critical Strike. When you consume stacks of Precision casting a Skill, that Skill gains [VALUE]% increased Critical Strike Damage.

uniqueSuffixes.name: Eaglehorn
uniqueSuffixes.description: Makes enemies Vulnerable for 3 seconds. Every 4th shot bounces off walls and deals [VALUE]% more damage.

uniqueSuffixes.name: Khanjar
uniqueSuffixes.description: Hits with this weapon increase your Attack Speed by [VALUE]% for 4 seconds.

uniqueSuffixes.name: Condemnation
uniqueSuffixes.description: Your Core Skills deal [VALUE]% increased damage when spending 3 Combo Points. Your Basic Skills using this weapon have a 50% chance to generate 3 Combo Points.

uniqueSuffixes.name: Fleshrender
uniqueSuffixes.description: Casting a Defensive Skill deals [VALUE]% damage to Nearby Poisoned enemies, increased by 50% for every 100 Willpower you have.

uniqueSuffixes.name: Verathiel
uniqueSuffixes.description: Basic Skills deal [VALUE]% increased damage but additionally cost 25 Primary Resource.

uniqueSuffixes.name: Black River
uniqueSuffixes.description: Corpse Explosion consumes up to 4 additional Corpses around the initial Corpse, gaining [VALUE]% damage.

uniqueSuffixes.name: Vehemen
uniqueSuffixes.description: Casting an Ultimate Skill grants or amplifies its matching Primary Spirit Hall Bonus with [VALUE]% potency for 15 seconds.

uniqueSuffixes.name: Endless Rage
uniqueSuffixes.description: Every 3rd cast of Fireball launches 2 additional projectiles and deals [VALUE]% increased damage.

uniqueSuffixes.name: Lam Esen
uniqueSuffixes.description: Your casts have a [VALUE]% chance to be attracted to enemies and last 300% longer.

uniqueSuffixes.name: Magnum Opus
uniqueSuffixes.description: Skills using this weapon deal [VALUE]% increased damage per point of Fury you have, but you lose 10 Fury every second.

uniqueSuffixes.name: Azurewrath
uniqueSuffixes.description: Up to a [VALUE]% chance to Freeze enemies for 3 seconds and deal 1000 Cold damage to them.

uniqueSuffixes.name: The Crone
uniqueSuffixes.description: Storm Skill also casts Storm Strike at [VALUE]% normal damage.

uniqueSuffixes.name: Doombringer
uniqueSuffixes.description: [VALUE]% chance to deal 900 Shadow damage to surrounding enemies and reduce their damage dealt by 20% for 5 second.

uniqueSuffixes.name: Hellhammer
uniqueSuffixes.description: Ignites the ground Burning enemies for an additional [VALUE]% damage over 4 seconds.

uniqueSuffixes.name: Overkill
uniqueSuffixes.description: Creates a shockwave, dealing [VALUE]% of its Base damage to enemies. Enemies who die to this effect also reset Death Blowâ€™s Cooldown.

uniqueSuffixes.name: Bloodless Scream
uniqueSuffixes.description: Your Darkness Skills Chill enemies for up to 100% and deal [VALUE]% increased damage to enemies.

uniqueSuffixes.name: Ancestral Boost
uniqueSuffixes.description: Your Darkness Skills have up to a [VALUE]% chance to generate 25 additional Essence against targets.

uniqueSuffixes.name: Blood Harvest
uniqueSuffixes.description: While using this weapon, damaging at least one enemy will create a blood pool that inflicts 100 Bleeding damage over 6 seconds. Enemies standing in the pool take [VALUE]% increased damage.

uniqueSuffixes.name: Sepazontec
uniqueSuffixes.description: Your Basic Skills deal [VALUE]% increased damage and always use their 3rd attack. Every 3rd cast of a Basic Skill strikes three times.

uniqueSuffixes.name: Sepazontec
uniqueSuffixes.description: While Channeling Incinerate, you periodically shoot embers that are attracted to enemies, each dealing [VALUE]% of Fire damage

uniqueSuffixes.name: The Oculus
uniqueSuffixes.description: Gain the effect of the Teleport Enchantment for free. When you Evade using Teleport Enchantment your defense increases by [VALUE]%.
